Upload data/code and submit SLURM job

Source: R/hpc.R
hpc_sync_and_submit.Rd

Builds remote directories, syncs data and code via rsync over an SSH multiplexed connection, and submits a SLURM job. Optional hpc_env preamble lines can be injected to load modules or set environment variables.

Usage

hpc_sync_and_submit(
  target,
  data_dir,
  hpc_base_dir,
  output_name,
  training_params,
  gpus = 1,
  hpc_env = NULL
)

Arguments

target

SSH target (e.g., "user@host" or a configured host).

data_dir

Local dataset directory.

hpc_base_dir

Remote base directory (the job will use a timestamped subdir).

output_name

Output/model name (used for remote subdirectory).

training_params

Character vector of CLI args passed to the Python trainer.

gpus

Number of GPUs to request.

hpc_env

Optional character vector of preamble lines (e.g., module loads).
